keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to protect public services like the NHS and schools by supporting Plaid Cymru's multi-billion pound investment programme.
Work to defend Cynon Valley and Wales against Tory attacks.
Ensure that Cynon Valley and Wales does not lose a single penny of funding as a result of Brexit.

mentions.candidate: Liz will be diligent, dependable, accessible and answerable to the people of the Cynon Valley.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour are too weak and divided to do this and have given up on Wales.

issues.brexitEurope: As a Plaid Cymru MP, Liz will fight to ensure that the Cynon Valley and Wales does not lose a single penny of funding as a result of Brexit.
issues.health: Liz works in the NHS with pre-school children with additional learning needs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born and bred in the Cynon Valley. Liz is married with 2 children who both attend local schools. An experienced former councillor and school governor for over 20 years.

examples: Liz will be diligent, dependable, accessible and answerable to the people of the Cynon Valley.
Labour are too weak and divided to do this and have given up on Wales.
